TBSim

Tuberculosis Simulation Framework

A comprehensive framework for modeling tuberculosis transmission and interventions using agent-based simulation
Welcome to TBSim

TBSim is a powerful framework for modeling tuberculosis transmission and interventions using agent-based simulation. Built on top of the Starsim framework, TBSim provides specialized tools for TB modeling while maintaining compatibility with the broader Starsim ecosystem.

What is TBSim?

TBSim is an agent-based modeling framework designed specifically for simulating tuberculosis transmission and interventions. It extends the Starsim framework with TB-specific functionality while maintaining full compatibility with the broader Starsim ecosystem.

Key Features

  • TB-Specific Modeling: Specialized modules for tuberculosis transmission, progression, and treatment
  • Co-morbidity Support: Integrated modeling of TB with HIV, malnutrition, and other conditions
  • Intervention Analysis: Comprehensive tools for evaluating TB interventions and policies
  • Calibration Tools: Built-in calibration methods for fitting models to epidemiological data
  • Visualization: Advanced plotting and analysis capabilities
  • Extensibility: Easy to extend with custom modules and interventions

Quick Start

import tbsim as tb
import starsim as ss

# Create a simple TB simulation
sim = tb.TBSim(
    n_agents=1000,
    duration=365,
    diseases=[tb.TB()],
    demographics=[ss.Births(), ss.Deaths()]
)

# Run the simulation
sim.run()

# Analyze results
sim.plot()

Getting Started

  • Tutorials: Step-by-step guides for common TB modeling tasks
  • User Guide: Comprehensive documentation of TBSim features
  • API Reference: Detailed API documentation
  • Examples: Ready-to-run example simulations

Installation

pip install tbsim

For development installation:

git clone https://github.com/your-org/tbsim.git
cd tbsim
pip install -e .

Citation

If you use TBSim in your research, please cite:

@software{tbsim2024,
  title={TBSim: Tuberculosis Simulation Framework},
  author={TBSim Contributors},
  year={2024},
  url={https://github.com/your-org/tbsim}
}
